name: TBFTW2018
description:
Late Cretacous - a small carbonaceous chondrite hits and starts a fire in North America.

Survival at the end of the world.
 
Attack and eat other dinosaurs, but be careful- every move you make costs pixels of health.  

The darkness will overtake you, eventually.


Left Click - Move to/Attack
Right Click - Roar

Double Click - Go Faster

"Q" quits game


Green = Alive
Orange = Caution
Red = Dead

Roar for a small health/vision boost.

The more you click, the more health you use; i.e. walking takes little health, dashing takes a little more.

Move as little as possible when the screen begins to grow red and shrink; you are dying.  Keep trying to survive until the fires overtake your nest.

Keep away from fire, unless it is raining.

Eat small prey to gain a health boost.

Battle large prey for a large health bounty.

Carry small prey to travel further.

Yellow = Power and Knowledge, Everlasting.

TBFTW LogNET.2018.2022
